title: Tea consumption by social class in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016
summary: This statistic shows the Tea consumption by social and class United in the Kingdom , Saui-Arabia and Green_bags , as at 2016 .
As at 2016 , the Tea consumption by social in the Kingdom amounted to 66 Fruit_and_herbal_tea dollars per ton , whereas the class C2DE amounted to 34 Fruit_and_herbal_tea dollars per ton .
Tea consumption is mainly used for the manufacture of antifreeze formulations and polyesters .
